full_summary:
### Mock Tower Risers Solicitation

#### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-237265/A
* **Publication Date:** Wednesday, August 10, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** Wednesday, September 21, 2022 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Amendment Date:** Thursday, September 15, 2022

#### Solicitation Description

The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of Mock Tower Risers. The requirement is outlined below. 

The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Due to COVID-19 pandemic impacts, reduced business hours and limited staff available at the specified bid receiving unit, constituents are encouraged to transmit electronic bids using epost Connect instead of any other method of bid delivery. 

The Department of National Defence seeks the following:

* Item 1, GSIN: 1670, NSN: 21-912-9579, Riser Assy, Mock Tower
	+ Part No.: 9640008-1 Nil, NCAGE: 36376 
	+ Quantity: 36, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CAAWC Trenton by November 30, 2022

Suppliers proposing equivalent or substitutable products must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE.

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Supporting Documents

You can download the solicitation and amendment documents from the Get Access to Canadian Government Opportunities website:

* Solicitation Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/10/7088033e9df9eb7ebf7df2cf/20220810_wpdd_press_release.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/10/7088033e9df9eb7ebf7df2cf/20220810_wpdd_press_release.pdf)
* Solicitation Document (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/10/a11ccfa7391c2e37d27763ae/20220810_WPDD_bref_press_release_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08
